website_summaries.verdict: The power steering fluid to choose when you need a small amount to keep the system maintained.
pros: Comes in a convenient size with just enough fluid for the occasional top off in the steering lines
Provides a good way to keep the power steering system well maintained without having to replace the entire fluid supply
cons: Smaller bottle won’t last long for many repeated uses

customer_reviews.title: Its power steering fluid
customer_reviews.text: Nothing more, nothing less. Standard power steering fluid that just works as it should. Ordering from Amazon and having it delivered to my home saves me time and gas.
customer_reviews.author: Dave W

customer_reviews.title: I now suck out what I can from the reservoir (about a ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the one without the stop-leak since I don't have that problem (yet). I have a Chevy Silverado diesel truck which uses the power steering pump/fluid for the brakes (hydroboost). If the power steering fluid gets old, the brakes don't work too well (ditto for the brake fluid, but that's another story). While I neglected the power steering fluid for the first few years, I now suck out what I can from the reservoir (about a pint) and put in this new fluid. I do this every oil change and it really helps with the brakes. Oh yeah, the steering work fine, too (no squeaks or groans or other noises)..
customer_reviews.author: Jake S.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my car
customer_reviews.text: My power steering fluid was running low the last time I checked, but I wasn't ready to make an appointment to my dealership's service department just for this. Don't know much about power steering fluid, but I think the one I got works pretty well, so far everything is great. Car is running smoothly without any glitches.
customer_reviews.author: Wen Tsen

customer_reviews.title: Helped Stop Noise in Power Steering
customer_reviews.text: Changing the fluid stopped noise in the power steering system. I used an automotive pump to drain the reservoir and replace the fluid once a year. Then drive in tight circles to move the fluid around and repeat the process.

customer_reviews.title: Temporary Fix

customer_reviews.title: I like this product because it does NOT have anti-leaking agent

product_meta.title: Prestone AS260 Power Steering Fluid - 12 oz.
product_meta.description: Style:Pack of 1| Size:12 oz.Prestone Power Steering Fluid is formulated with high-quality oil and fortified with additives to stop pump squealing, prevent wear, and protect seals, maintaining smooth power-steering operation. Compatible with factory fluids, it meets service requirements of GM, Ford, Chrysler and many global manufacturers. This formula contains several key ingredients to ensure smooth system operation: anti-wear agents to protect pump components; antioxidants to prevent sludge formation; seal conditioners to protect and rejuvenate seals; anti-foam agents to prevent pump cavitation and steering loss; corrosion inhibitors to protect metal components; and pour point depressants for good steering even in low temperatures.
feature_bullets: Seal conditioners protect and rejuvenate seals
Helps to stop pump squealing and prevent abnormal wear
